channel.title: Self-indulgence on Lisa's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Self-indulgence on Lisa's Notebook

item.title: What is this Blog For, Again?
item.description: Forgive the self-indulgence of this entry. I am genuinely trying to work out the answer to this question. I, like many, adopted this notebook blog inspired by David MacIver, who makes a convincing case for the value of writing daily. This blog was initially intended to be a daily blog, and for the first month, full of enthusiasm for a new project, it almost was. The intensity has dialled down a bit since.
